entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regex Source Generator doesn't react when removing the attribute invocation causing it to break the design time build. #69880
  • [NativeAOT] Issue with expressing a Expression<Delegate> in a RD.xml file #69875
  • [Android] Some System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests failing #69870
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Assertion failure in interpreter on v8/windows: `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3440` #69868
  • [release/7.0-preview5][wasm] Assertion failure in interpreter `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:2114` #69864
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) when calling Managed function using C# #69862
  • [wasm] perf pipeline builds failing to build the wasm app #69861
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests timing out on Windows #69860
  • Question: how could we execute code in a standalone assembly load context? #69855
  • Many jobs are failing with a 401 response #69854
  • mono Linux x64 Methodical_others error on runtime rolling build #69853
  • Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #69852
    7.0.0
  • How about use IReadonly with Options pattern #69851
  • Mono Browser wasm Release failures on runtime rolling build #69850
  • Debugger cannot evaluate when multiple event handlers was bound. #69849
  • Symbol stripping in NativeAOT to reduce binary size #69847
  • macOS Process.GetProcessesByName can not get process when process name length more than 15 #69846
  • [macOS] Listing system certificates bails out on invalid certificates in keychain #69845
  • Wasm bindings need an error handling overhaul #69836
    Future
  • Test failure System.Reflection.Tests.MethodInfoTests.CallStackFrame_AggressiveInlining #69835

Closed

  • Process.GetProcesses returns processes with truncated names on MacOS #69883
  • superpmi.py: enable collection/replay of JIT asserts #41649
    7.0.0
  • MethodInfo objects for same method are not equal #67989
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0.0-rc.2 on Raspberry Pi cannot write to writable network file #61175
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize issue with arrays/lists and whitespace #69859
  • Pass through diagnostic information for failed calls to IPC WriteDumpAsync #64069
    7.0.0
  • Improve the dotnet-dump error message: Core dump generation FAILED 0x80004005 #54521
    7.0.0
  • High native memory usage in certificate revocation checking #52577
    7.0.0
  • CLRJit Access Violation on when attempting to run Windows ARM64 app #69222
    7.0.0
  • Strange error message from LibraryImport #69827
  • Analyzer/fixer for converting Regex use to source generator #68147
    7.0.0
  • Skip AMSI anti-malware scan when loading an assembly #69844
  • [Uri] Absolute paths using UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute parsed as relative on iOS and Android #69618
    7.0.0
  • Debug API methods returns "The operation failed because the debugger could not get the metadata. The error code is CORDBG_E_MISSING_METADATA, or0x80131C35." message on .NET 6 #69841
  • Add PoolingAsyncValueTaskMethodBuilder to System.Net.Security.SslStream.ReadAsyncInternal() #68467
    7.0.0
  • ProcessName returns truncated 15 char string on MacOS #69726
  • Data Annotation Extensions #69834
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\Activator\\Activator.cmd #62696
    7.0.0
  • Outerloop stress legs triggering on PRs they shouldn't #69829
  • Remove un-needed target when upgrading to v2 BuildTools #8050
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Speed up Convert.ToBase64String() #69884
    community-contribution
  • limit retries of EPROTOTYPE on macOS #69882
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Remove CORCOMPILE_IMPORT_SECTION #69881
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix Stream.ReadAtLeast perf regression in DataContractSerializer #69879
    area-Serialization
  • JIT: defer some flow graph reordering until after loop recognition #69878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement PemEncoding.WriteString #69877
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] Fix flags usage on Linux #69874
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][debugging] Adding instructions for native debugging #69873
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator (#68976) #69872
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Move off preview onto regular Windows 11 client images #69871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Enable JitConsumeProfileForCasts by default #69869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make `interp_to_native_signatures_count` static #69867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Revert "[mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter (#68823)" #69866
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Faster long->int overflow checks #69865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable runtime test failing due to stack overflow #69863
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Process WebSocket connection errors on NodeJS #69858
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add issue cleanup documentation and update automation #69857
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add support for processing Unified TLS frames #69848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Implement LoadLibraryErrorTracker #69842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] enable the promote feature. #69840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Remove Or, And, Not + related fixes #69839
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [NativeAot] Null ref return is wrapped in TargetInvocationException #69838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pin char when UTF-16 marshalling is specified and runtime marshalling is disabled #69837
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Restore internal tools #69753
  • Disable failing MsQuic tests on Windows #69798
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Redisable timouting MsQuic tests #69843
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make SPMI collections work on crashes/assertion failures #69494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix value type unboxing bug #69815
    area-System.Reflection
  • File system type fix #69484
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update gcc leg to 12.1.0 #69188
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Reduce unnecessary casting/locals in pinning path #69804
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the exception's dispatch by EPC. #69712
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Better createdump error messages #69663
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous diagnostic #69830
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Some clean-up of host tests #69802
    area-Host
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix VM calling convention detection for some pinvokes #69774
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add default method support to virtual statics #69783
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix whitespace in repro project #69825
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • A few tweaks to regex source generator comments / naming for lookbehinds #69773
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Cryptography.Xml.Tests: skip tests that require rsa+sha1 when platform doesn't support it. #69713
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, area-Host, community-contribution
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Relax the addres exposure condition in forward substitution #69818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Annotate System.Runtime tests for NativeAOT #69803
  • Implement fake hot/cold splitting and corresponding stress mode #69763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the segment fault within JIT_UpdateWriteBarrierState. #69782
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [Android] Add UnmanagedCallersOnly attribute to SafeDeleteSslContext.ReadFromConnection/WriteToConnection methods #69507
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers, when LLVM is enabled #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    community-contribution
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [MONO] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Mark IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() as nullable #69821
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • WIP: Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Cleanup a few more allocations in X.509 #69831
    area-System.Security
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
